issue.errorLine1: <string name="crash_dialog__report_instructions" comment="Issue tracker report instructions for the crash dialog. The %s placeholder is the name of the crash report template and always in English/LTR.">بەهۆی هەڵەیەکی لەناکاو تەختەکلیل لەکارکەوت...\nبەکارهێنەری بەرێز لەکاتی بوونی کێشە یان وەستانی لەناکاوی بەرنامەکە تکایە ئەم بەشە فەرامۆش مەکەو هاوکاربە لە چارەسەرکردنیدا\n

issue.message: The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.
This `Cursor` should be freed up after use with `#close()`
issue.errorLine1: val cur = database.query(layout, arrayOf ( "code", "text" ), "code LIKE ? || '%'", arrayOf(content.composingText), "", "", "code ASC, weight DESC", "$maxCandidateCount");

issue.message: This folder configuration (`v26`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `mipmap-anydpi`.
This initialization lambda (`{ 0 }`) is unnecessary and is less efficient
Very long vector path (953 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
Prefer `mutableIntStateOf` instead of `mutableStateOf`
